attributes.action: Make gyms an essential service and allow them to be open during lockdown
attributes.additional_details: UK government to class gyms as an essential service, because it is! As a serving member of the British military not having a place to maintain physical and mental well-being, makes us less-effective at our jobs, the same goes for civilians.
attributes.background: Gyms are essential to maintain physical and mental fitness for everyone! Physical fitness, especially for those who’s jobs depend on it, like military and emergency responders is essential, not a luxury! COVID is hard enough on everyone’s wellbeing, with proper measures in place make this happen!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
